title: Spacious 1x1 w/ Balcony Attached
posting_body: ['Mason & Main', '209 12th Avenue South, Seattle, WA, 98104', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 1', 'OR Text', '1', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Living the Life with Luxury', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 712-792 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- • Air conditioning ports', '- Apartment Amenities', '- • New stainless steel appliances', '- • Learning thermostat', '- • Full size washer/dryer', '- • Energy efficient LED lighting', '- • Multiple finish schemes', '- • Dishwasher', '- • Large Closets', '- • Patio/Balcony', '- • Wood grain plank flooring', 'Community Amenities', '- VAULT BAR This speakeasy-inspired lounge is the perfect place to mix an old fashioned and catch up with friends', "- THE YARD Mason & Main's signature outdoor zone, featuring grills, a variety of outdoor lounge and seating pods, and more", '- THE GARDEN Fresh air and greenery are offered around the clock in The Garden.', 'Take in a great book, listen to the birds and enjoy the landscape', '- FITNESS Design your personal workout program at either of our fully equipped fitness centers, styled with vintage Seattle sports culture in mind', "- DOG RUNS & SPA We didn't overlook our favorite four-legged residents.", 'Dogs will be right at home with our two convenient outdoor spaces and well-equipped pet wash', '- SCREENING ROOM Created for all types of entertainment, this is the perfect place to belt out your new favorite karaoke ballad, catch up on the latest episode or challenge friends to an esports throwdown', '- SKY LOUNGE & DECK Why settle for one great rooftop amenity when you can choose from two?', 'Our Sky Lounge & Deck offer a smaller, more intimate rooftop setting that is perfect for solo recharges, pre-dinner meetups and small groups.', '- YESLER LOUNGE', 'The social center of Mason & Main, our Yesler Lounge brings all the energy of the city together in one place.', 'Host game night or watch the Sounders match', '- VISTA LOUNGE & DECK Relax and take in the unobstructed Seattle skyline, or step outside onto the Vista Deck and soak up the summer sunshine while gazing across the PNW cityscape', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 1:00PM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'JAeVONZoSi20']
